Package io.openems.edge.bridge.modbus.api.task

Class AbstractTask

java.lang.Object
io.openems.edge.bridge.modbus.api.task.AbstractTask
All Implemented Interfaces:
Task, ManagedTask
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractReadTask, FC16WriteRegistersTask, FC5WriteCoilTask, FC6WriteRegisterTask
public abstract class AbstractTask extends Object implements Task
An abstract Modbus 'AbstractTask' is holding references to one or more Modbus ModbusElement which have register addresses in the same range.

    • execute

      public final int execute(AbstractModbusBridge bridge) throws OpenemsException
      Executes the tasks - i.e. sends the query of a ReadTask or writes a WriteTask.

      Internally the _execute()-method of the specific subclass gets called.

      Specified by:
      execute in interface Task
      Parameters:
      bridge - the Modbus-Bridge
      Returns:
      the number of executed Sub-Tasks
      Throws:
      OpenemsException - on error
